children.subject:
Depends.

Sometimes if you apply now, they will want to interview you now. Are you comfortable with data structures, some basic algorithms, and are you able to see how small parts of a program can come together to a large program? If not, perhaps wait. Though, ask them when the interview will be. I had a friend who applied for a summer internship in December 2016 but didn't get brought for an interview until a few months later (odd).

history.content: It certainly doesn't hurt to try applying; it might be difficult for you in some interviews because they assume Data Structures knowledge, but it can't really hurt to try, and at any rate getting used to the recruiting process is always a good thing :)
I am currently taking CS 61B. Can I apply to SWE internship now, or is it better to wait till next year to apply?
history.subject: Can I apply to SWE internship before finishing 61B?
